## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[DefaultHintApplicator](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.defaulthintapplicator.md)


</td><td>

Default hint applicator that converts hints to cell state updates.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[EducationalContent](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.educationalcontent.md)


</td><td>

Educational content manager for Sudoku solving techniques.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ExplanationFormatter](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.explanationformatter.md)


</td><td>

Utility class for formatting and displaying hint explanations.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ExplanationRegistry](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.explanationregistry.md)


</td><td>

Registry for managing hint explanation providers.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[HiddenSinglesProvider](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.hiddensinglesprovider.md)


</td><td>

Hint provider for the Hidden Singles technique.

A Hidden Single occurs when a value can only be placed in one cell within a row, column, or 3x3 box, even though that cell may have multiple candidates.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[HintRegistry](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.hintregistry.md)


</td><td>

Implementation of the hint registry that manages and coordinates multiple hint providers.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[HintSystem](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.hintsystem.md)


</td><td>

Main hint system that provides comprehensive hint generation and management.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[NakedSinglesProvider](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.nakedsinglesprovider.md)


</td><td>

Hint provider for the Naked Singles technique.

A Naked Single occurs when a cell has only one possible candidate value based on the constraints of its row, column, and 3x3 box.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[PuzzleSessionHints](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.puzzlesessionhints.md)


</td><td>

Wrapper class that integrates hint functionality with PuzzleSession. Provides hint generation, application, and explanation capabilities while maintaining integration with existing state management and undo/redo functionality.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
